For the Last Decade there has been ongoing terror or racism law of crime occured

My point or opinion to put across is No Ethnic Background or Religion nor race should be labelised for the past or existing events on Terrorism or Racism acts

Nowdays war is beyond  a joke and specifically ai feel the existing Government of United Kibgdom is Targetting Islamic background people the cause of Extremism etc

Islam teaches you the value of your surroundings respecting one another
Islam has never Influenced Extremism  nor Terrorism
So to re-itterate this to Teresa May is thatno point tighter measures in the UK airports you should be Liasing with Middle Eastern Countries to calm down War and come to agreements.

I hope whom ever reads my petition feels that this is a great deal to existing current affairs in the world

Thankyou

Sara
